title: Response #1 to Bill Meacham's criticisms of my proposal to radiocarbon-date the Shroud's pollen
post: Have you ever studied saints with stigmata like Padre Pio who bore the Wounds Of Christ?  His wound were on the hands not the wrists.  Similarly with all other deceased and living people with stigmatas.   Doesn't this contradict the Turin shroud which shows wounds on the wrists and not the hands?
author: Thuy Nguyen
